title: README Generator
description:
Create a function that generates a standard README structure.

Given a project configuration object (name, description, installation, usage), return a formatted Markdown string.
hints: Use template literals for multiline strings

testCases.input: { name: 'Test', description: 'Desc', installation: 'npm i', usage: 'start', license: 'MIT' }
testCases.expectedOutput:
# Test

Desc

## Installation

```bash
npm i
```

## Usage

start

## License

MIT

title: JSDoc Generator
description:
Implement a function that generates a JSDoc comment block for a function signature.

Input: function name, parameters (name, type), return type, and description.
Output: A string containing the JSDoc comment.

testCases.input: { name: 'add', params: [{name: 'a', type: 'number', description: 'First'}], returnType: 'number', returnDescription: 'Sum', description: 'Adds numbers' }

title: Changelog Parser
description:
Parse a list of commit messages and group them into a Changelog object.

Commits follow the Conventional Commits format (e.g., 'feat: add login', 'fix: resolve bug').
Group by 'feat', 'fix', and 'other'.
hints: Remove the prefix (feat:, fix:) using substring
Handle case sensitivity if needed (assume lowercase for this)

title: SemVer Incrementer
description:
Implement a function to increment a Semantic Version string.

Inputs: version string (e.g., '1.0.0'), release type ('major', 'minor', 'patch').
Output: New version string.
hints: Reset lower version numbers when incrementing higher ones (e.g., minor resets patch)

title: Documentation Link Validator
description:
Validate that all internal links in a documentation page resolve to existing headers.

Input: markdown content string.
Output: Array of broken link texts (e.g., '[Link](#missing)').
hints: Slugify header text to match anchor format

title: Presentation Timer
description:
Calculate the total estimated time for a presentation.

Input: Array of slides, where each slide has an estimated minute count.
Output: Total minutes.

title: Release Note Formatter
description:
Format a release note object into a readable text block.

Input: version, date, features list, bugs list.
Output: Formatted string.
hints: Check if arrays are empty before adding headers

title: User Guide To HTML
description:
Convert a simple User Guide custom text format to HTML.

Format: Lines starting with '*' are list items, lines starting with '#' are headers, others are paragraphs.
hints: Close open tags when switching formats

title: Code Comment Density
description:
Calculate the percentage of lines of code that are comments.

Input: string of code.
Output: percentage (0-100).
Assume lines starting with // are comments.

title: Screenshot Config Generator
description:
Generate a configuration object for an automated screenshot tool.

Input: list of URLs and output directory.
Output: Config object.
hints: Set defaults for format and fullPage

title: License Header Applicator
description:
Prepend a license header to a file content if it's missing.

Input: file content, license header.
Output: file content with header.

title: PDF Export Options
description:
Create a function to validate PDF export options.

Margins must be non-negative. Page format must be A4 or Letter.

title: Demo Script Prompter
description: Given a script with steps and durations, return the current step based on elapsed time.
hints: Check if elapsedSeconds falls in current window

title: Feedback Analyzer
description:
Analyze an array of feedback scores (1-5) and text comments.

Return average score and count of 'positive' comments (containing 'great' or 'good').
hints: Use filter for counting positive comments

title: Project Reflection Stats
description:
Calculate project statistics for a reflection report.

Input: completed tasks (estimated vs actual hours), bugs found.
Output: Accuracy ratio (total estimated / total actual) and bug density (bugs / task count).

title: Portfolio Card Generator
description:
Generate HTML for a portfolio project card.

Input: project title, image URL, link.
Output: HTML string.
